statements: SELECT * FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT sender, recipient, log_timestamp FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE log_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE sender = 'NASA' AND recipient = 'SpaceX';
SELECT message FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender FROM mission_control_communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender, recipient, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender, recipient, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Mission Control';
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender, recipient, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender, recipient, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Space Station Alpha' AND recipient = 'Mission Control';
SELECT id, log_timestamp, sender, recipient, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM mission_control_communication_logs;
SELECT datetime, message FROM astronaut_communication_logs ORDER BY datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE datetime < '2022-01-01';
SELECT message FROM astronaut_communication_logs WHERE astronaut_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT log_id, datetime, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM mission_control_communication_logs ORDER BY datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT message, datetime FROM astronaut_communication_logs WHERE astronaut_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
SELECT log_id, message FROM mission_control_communication_logs WHERE datetime BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM astronaut_communication_logs WHERE datetime > '2022-02-15' ORDER BY datetime ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT astronaut_id, COUNT(*) AS num_logs FROM astronaut_communication_logs GROUP BY astronaut_id HAVING num_logs > 5 ORDER BY num_logs DESC;
SELECT * FROM MissionControlLog;
SELECT log_id, astronaut_id, log_timestamp FROM MissionControlLog ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, astronaut_id, log_timestamp FROM MissionControlLog WHERE astronaut_id = 1;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, end_date FROM SpaceMission;
SELECT mission_id, mission_name, launch_date FROM SpaceMission WHERE launch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SpaceMission ORDER BY launch_date DESC, mission_name ASC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, end_date FROM SpaceMission WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT comm_id, astronaut_id, comm_type, comm_timestamp FROM AstronautCommunication WHERE comm_type = 'outgoing' ORDER BY comm_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM MissionControlLog WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, end_date FROM SpaceMission WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM mission_control;
SELECT mission_name, mission_id FROM mission_control;
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_role FROM astronauts;
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_logs;
SELECT message_text FROM message_content;
SELECT * FROM mission_control;
SELECT mission_name, mission_id FROM mission_control ORDER BY mission_id DESC;
SELECT astronaut_name, astronaut_role FROM astronauts WHERE astronaut_role = 'Commander';
SELECT communication_type, communication_date FROM communication_logs WHERE communication_type = 'Outgoing' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT message_text, log_id FROM message_content WHERE message_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM mission_control;
SELECT id, communication_date, communication_type FROM mission_control WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message FROM mission_control WHERE communication_type = 'Emergency';
SELECT * FROM astronauts ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, rank FROM astronauts WHERE mission_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM mission_control ORDER BY communication_date DESC;
SELECT name, age, rank FROM astronauts WHERE rank = 'Commander';
SELECT mission_name, launch_date, landing_date FROM missions WHERE launch_date >= '2022-01-01' AND landing_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT sender, receiver, communication_date FROM communication_logs WHERE sender = 'Houston' OR receiver = 'Houston' ORDER BY communication_date ASC;
SELECT spaceship_name, capacity FROM spaceships WHERE mission_id = 1 AND capacity > 50;
